dynOwner.expression:
["tUser.ID IN 
(SELECT (CASE WHEN ORGTYPE = 4 THEN (SELECT USERID FROM JGCRM.LBMEMBER WHERE ORGID = 13719 AND ROLEID = 3 and rownum = 1)
 WHEN ORGTYPE = 3 THEN (SELECT USERID FROM JGCRM.LBMEMBER WHERE ORGID = 10016 AND ROLEID = 3 and rownum = 1)
 WHEN ORGTYPE NOT IN (3,4) 
 AND (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM JGCRM.TSYSPARAM WHERE PARAMNAME = 'lbrole.thglzb.lcwt' AND PARAMVALUE = '1') > 0
 THEN (SELECT USERID FROM JGCRM.LBMEMBER WHERE ORGID = 10089 AND ROLEID = 3 and rownum = 1)
 ELSE (SELECT USERID FROM JGCRM.LBMEMBER WHERE ORGID = 10015 AND ROLEID = 3 and rownum = 1) END)
 FROM JGCRM.LBORGANIZATION
 WHERE ID = {0})",[{"expression":"O_WORKFLOW.SQBM","scale":0,"length":0,"type":1}]]

step.name: 分管领导（公司领导）审批

function.name: abs.Expression
function.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var s=ABS_SQLVALUE("SELECT COUNT(1) FROM JGCRM.OS_CURRENTSTEP T,JGCRM.LBWFCURRENTOWNER A WHERE T.ID = A.STEPID AND T.ENTRY_ID = ? AND T.STEP_ID = 93 AND A.OWNER = ?",[O_WORKFLOW.InstID,$Login.User]);
if (s>0){
LB_workAction("lcIB_YYSPD",O_WORKFLOW.ID,94,"");
ABS_flushObjCache('WORKFLOW.TASK')
}

function.name: abs.Expression
function.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var a=ABS_LOADBEAN("com.apex.bss.mod.gdzqWorkflowWebservice.workflowSamples.InternalDocumentsJavabean");
var oaid=a.creatNewWorkFlow("lcIB_YYSPD",O_WORKFLOW.ID,O_WORKFLOW.XMMC.ID,$Login.User,'100000');
var ret = LB_sqlProcedure("{call ecif.pro_ib_oaresulthandle(:ral{int},:ret,?,?,?,?)}",[oaid,O_WORKFLOW.ID,"lcIB_YYSPD",$Login.User]); 
ABS_SETRETNOTE(ret.get('ret'));
if(ret.get('ral')>0){
	true;
}else{
	false;
}

function.name: lb.Assert
function.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var status=ABS_SQLVALUE("select max(status) from ecif.tib_oawfhandle where upper(lcbd)=upper('lcIB_YYSPD') and lcbdid=?",[O_WORKFLOW.ID]);
status==1

step.name: 内核办权益类团队负责人
